entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
I want to return something. I'm not happy with it.
I understand. I can help you with that. What is the item you wish to return?
It's a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a couple of weeks ago, and it's just not working out for me.
Okay, I understand. And when did you purchase the VeloBand Pulse?
About 15 days ago, I think. Look, this is a smart watch; it should be smarter! The heart rate is all over the place, and I'm just done with it.
I apologize you're having trouble with your VeloBand Pulse. Let me check your order details. Can I have your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's [customer's email address]. Hurry up, I don't have all day!
Thank you. One moment, please... Okay, I see your order here. Yes, I can process a return for you. Our return policy is 90 days for most items. So you are well within that window.
90 days? That's good to hear! I thought I'd be stuck with this thing. Can I just send it back, then?

Yes, absolutely. I'll email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse securely, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive it, we'll process your refund.
Perfect! Will I get a full refund?
Yes, you will receive a full refund to your original method of payment once the return is processed. It usually takes about 7-10 business days after we receive the VeloBand Pulse.
Okay, great! That sounds easy enough. I appreciate it.
You're welcome. I'm happy I could help. The return label and instructions will be sent to your email address within the next hour. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

You're very welcome! Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day! If you have any further questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us. The VeloBand Pulse and other smart watch return questions are things our customer service team handles frequently.
